text: I built a script that does this through the console with simulated clicks, but there's something happening behind the scenes in React that is creating huge lag that grows exponentially with each additional selection.  It would be much more efficient to update the state through the React app to cut out all of the unnecessary processing.

Bonus points for an advanced selection that would select specified types of files, so I don't have to go back and deselect email templates. Or build that as step 1 of the `copy to portal` action so you don't have to select everything you want to copy before you run the action.
Or open up the portal-design-copy API so we can write our own stuff to do all this
